title: Who can replace the Linkin Park band? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tetrach are a little heavier than Linkin Park, but the influence is really hard to miss. They might fill that void for a lot of LP fans.
You cannot replace anyone. People are finite. Once you are gone - that is it. There is no clone to replace anyone. Linkin Park can't be replaced by any band.
